text: Dattaka ghetalelya mulanna tyancya (kharya) pityancya sambandhane haka mara. Allahajavala purna n'yaya haca ahe. Maga jara tumhala tyance (khare) pita mahita nasatila tara te tumace dharma-bandhava ani mitra aheta.1 Tumacyakaduna bhulacuka mhanuna kahi ghadalyasa tyababata tumacyavara kasalahi gunha nahi, parantu gunha to ahe, jyaca tumhi irada karala ani irada manapasuna karala. Allaha motha mapha karanara, daya karanara ahe
